Description:
User has indicated they haven't instigated the MFA prompt and could indicate an attacker has the password for the account.

Author: AlertIQ
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Multifactor Authentication Denied
Query: sourcetype='azure-signinlogs' eql select * from _source_ where authenticationrequirement = 'multifactorauthentication' and status like '%mfa denied%'
